name: Septillion
description: BEP-20 native token introducing investors and customers to a genuinely passive income scheme. This BEP-20 technology that prevents wastage of energy and computations while ensuring the distributions of Proof of Stake(PoS) consensus. We are not only providing a highly profitable way but we also allow to participate in different launchpads. This is providing any fund raising phases to all the traders. Traders and investors can access both funds and assets quickly. The project is launched to make it more interesting for the users. Our token will be used in NFT's like concert tickets, an artistic assetts. Traders can use the token in gaming sector.Our game can be played on Virtual Reality,Computer, Android and Browser. It will be acceptable in the hospitality industry as well. Septillion is working on the concept of converting 100 GB of data into 1 MB to 100 MB in couple of minutes. The main theme of SEPTILLION (SPT) is a complete ECOSYSTEM universe in which historical buildings are located and natural life is protected
